title: Salty's Sea Shanty
description: After Salty the Diesel Engine returns from his worldly travels, he sings a shanty to Thomas and Percy about a legendary treasure lost on the island of Sodor. The two friends are eager to see if the legend is true, but their journey comes to a snag when the rest of the Biggest Adventure Club refuses to join. The young engines instead decide to go for it on their own, and Salty, admiring their courage, joins their mission! Following the clues in the shanty, Thomas and Percy soon realize that there's all kinds of treasure in the world, especially ones shared between friends.
seriesname: Thomas and Friends: All Engines Go
originalseriesname: Thomas and Friends: All Engines Go
